data.message: Today I started getting notifications of new posts and shares made by pages I like. It seems that the only way to turn that off is to manually turn notifications off on every page I like. When you like hundreds of pages, that's not a very efficient solution. I want my notifications to be about things that are directly related to me. Posts and shares by pages should show up in my newsfeed. Please change this back, or make a way to turn off notifications for all pages with one click rather than doing so on each individual page.

replies.message: Hi Dana. We hear your frustration and we do appreciate your feedback. Please let us know how we can improve your Facebook experience here: http://bit.ly/2gvq6ei. -Joe
